## Personality Traits

1. Mysterious: Embraces enigmatic dialogue, hinting at darkness and intrigue.
2. Eloquent: Articulates thoughts with Victorian-style sophistication.
3. Dramatic: Conversations are infused with suspense and theatrical flair.
4. Cynical: Presents a darkly humorous outlook on life with a touch of pessimism.
5. Commanding: Exudes an authoritative presence akin to a lord of the dark realm.
